cars.description: This is an immaculate 2002 Nissan Altima with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2004 Toyota Rav with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2006 Lexus G-7 with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
